title: 蛤蟆吃联机如何设置难度
author: Tenkawa_Subete

replies.author: akeicon
replies.txt_content:
后台输入difficulty 0~3或者前台输入/difficulty 0~3

0:和平; 1:简单; 2:普通; 3:困难
